plot: The Xenomorph have infested the Californian town of San Drad and it's up to the Predator Hunter, Lt.Linn Kurosawa, the Predator Warrior and Major Alan 'Dutch' Schaefer to wipe them out. The game is basically a side scrolling beat-em-up with the usual power-ups and distractions along the way.

m.role: Wolf Predator from the second movie: Highly experienced, with a lot of so badass weapons to hunt, and yeah, he curb stomped a lot of xenos without taking a sweat, and makes a very badass fight with the Predalien where all other predators were cannon fodder!

In Alien vs. Predator, the predator uses acidic alien blood to scar himself as a victory ritual. Another predator scars the Final Girl this way. She barely even flinches despite the acid's telltale sizzle.

name: Alien vs. Predator
